data.label: Default
data.description: The default color scheme. Is commonly used in guideline.

data.label: Monochrome
data.description: Some people find this easier, some harder. Note that shapeshifting is impossible with no color.

data.label: Arika
data.description: Often used in arcade-styled block stackers.

data.label: Tetra-X
data.description: Occasionally used with the Tetra-X rotation system.

data.label: Cultris II
data.description: Default color scheme exclusive to Cultris II

data.label: Spirit Drop
data.description: Default color scheme exclusive to Spirit Drop
